paper_title: An explicit upper bound for $L(1, χ)$ when $χ$ is quadratic
abstract: We consider Dirichlet $L$-functions $L(s, χ)$ where $χ$ is a non-principal quadratic character to the modulus $q$. We make explicit a result due to Pintz and Stephens by showing that $|L(1, χ)|\leq \frac{1}{2}\log q$ for all $q\geq 2\cdot 10^{23}$ and $|L(1, χ)|\leq \frac{9}{20}\log q$ for all $q\geq 5\cdot 10^{50}$.
